subject: Re: New icons
preview: Hi Anita,Hope all is well. Yes, we have updated the infographics of MS Brainbank and Trials sites too. Let us know if you need further assistance. Cheers!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Anita,

Hope all is well. Yes, we have updated the infographics of MS Brainbank and Trials sites too. 

Let us know if you need further assistance. Cheers!

Hi Heath, Can you please confirm that the MS Brainbank and Trials sites have been updated as I am unable to see the new updated icons.
  • Anita

Thanks Heath. Anita could you please double check in the morning and advise accordingly so we can close the request.

Many thanks

Kind regards
Trish

Hi Trish, 

Confirming the revised infographics have now been loaded up to their respective sites. I have attached a WordDoc of the revised graphics across all three sites.

Amazing thank you so much

Kind regards
Trish

Hi Trish, 

All good, we have been working on these today and will be loading them up shortly. I will send you an email once complete, as well as a copy of the updated images.

Hi Heath
Apologies for the urgency but any chance the icons identified as requiring correction can be done ASAP.

Thank you

Kind regards
Trish

Hi,

Just following up on the below email. Can you please let me know when the changes have been actioned?

Kind regards,



Anita Turuta
MS Research Australia

Thank you!

Many thanks
Trish
